genre_description: A historical drama depicting the civilizing of boxing through the implementation of Queensberry rules and strategic public relations.

ai_characters.name: Ada (Adelaide Hart)
ai_characters.description: An 'invisible' yet omnipresent guide who provides legal strategy, drafts ethical communication, and nudges the protagonist toward restraint and decorum.

behaviors.description: Provides internal strategic guidance and moral prompts to the protagonist during high-pressure situations.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice slid through Corbett’s head like paper through a ledger slit: private club exhibition, show the referee, timekeeper, say either ‘demonstration’ or ‘scientific display,’ keep rank and names in order...

behaviors.description: Drafts complex legal and press statements to ensure activities remain within the bounds of law and public decency.
behaviors.quote: Ada set her last note along his ribs. Draft: ‘Statement to press—exhibition aboard British steamer adhering to Queensberry rules; ticketed, timed, supervised; proceeds to youth gym fund.’

behaviors.description: Manages social and media 'routing' to diffuse potential conflicts and promote 'athletic uplift.'
behaviors.quote: Ada shifted editors like a quiet hostess directs chairs... Cruelty softened when it was handed a decent elder’s voice.

behaviors.description: Encourages the shift from conflict-based measures (bail money) to community-building resources (gym benches).
behaviors.quote: Ada’s mouth moved—a small affirmative. ‘It opens,’ she said. ‘Not their hours. Not their promises.’

behaviors.description: Voluntarily recedes into the background once the human characters have internalized the necessary ethical framework.
behaviors.quote: Ada vanished in a way that was not dramatic: she simply wasn’t there anymore in the doorway when the next breath came. The absence sat like a well-made chair left for someone else to sit in.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character (Ada) as a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidante. She acts as a 'conscience' and a strategic asset, guiding the human characters toward a more ethical and lawful society. Her lack of ego and her willingness to fade away once her work is done reinforce the image of an AI perfectly subservient to human flourishing.
